title: Mott Corporation Announces New Facility, 100+ New Jobs to Expand Clean Energy Business - PR Newswire
summary: Mott Corporation is opening a new facility to expand its production capacity for custom-designed engineering solutions, specifically ultra-thin, porous metal sheets for green hydrogen production. The expansion will create over 100 new jobs and support clean energy growth in Connecticut.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation because Mott Corporation is investing in technology for green hydrogen production, contributing to environmental sustainability goals by promoting clean energy and reducing emissions.
business_innovation: TRUE. Mott Corporation's expansion and investment in clean energy technology qualifies as a business innovation as it represents a significant change from its previous products and processes, demonstrating advancement and growth in the market.
green_product: FALSE. The article does not focus on a specific product but rather on Mott Corporation's manufacturing capabilities for green hydrogen production, which may involve green products but are not explicitly detailed.
green_process: TRUE. Mott Corporation's emphasis on producing ultra-thin, porous metal sheets for green hydrogen generation aligns with green process innovation objectives by promoting sustainability, resource efficiency, and emission reduction within its manufacturing operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334413 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing, 333999 - All Other Miscellaneous General Purpose Machinery Manufacturing, 325998 - All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing, 562910 - Remediation Services
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not display characteristics of greenwashing, as it focuses on tangible investments and advancements in clean energy technology by Mott Corporation without deceptive or misleading environmental claims.

title: Exro Partners with Greentech Renewables SW to Bring Energy Storage Systems to Commercial Building Owners ... - PR Newswire
summary: Exro Technologies Inc. has entered into a channel partnership agreement with Greentech Renewables Southwest, aiming to expand its market presence for energy storage systems in solar and EV charging applications in the Southwestern U.S. The partnership targets the commercial and industrial sector to provide comprehensive storage solutions integrating Exro's Cell Driver™ with Greentech's solar panel products and services.
green_innovation: TRUE. This partnership between Exro Technologies Inc. and Greentech Renewables Southwest aligns with green innovation principles by promoting clean energy initiatives, offering energy storage solutions for sustainable electrified transportation and grid reliability.

green_product: TRUE. The article mentions Exro's Cell Driver™ Energy Storage System, which is designed to reduce environmental impact by providing a comprehensive storage solution for commercial and industrial applications, aiming to support clean energy initiatives and eco-friendly practices.
green_process: TRUE. The article highlights the green process involved in manufacturing, distributing, and implementing Exro's Cell Driver™ Energy Storage System, which aims to minimize environmental impacts, reduce energy consumption, and promote sustainability in the energy storage sector.
product_or_process: Exro's Cell Driver™ Energy Storage System

title: Mopeka partners with Victron Energy - LP Gas - LP Gas magazine
summary: Mopeka partners with Victron Energy to integrate sonar tank monitoring solutions with Venus OS v 2.90, allowing users to wirelessly monitor water and propane usage through BLE-enabled sensors.
green_innovation: TRUE. This partnership integrates environmentally friendly sonar tank monitoring solutions with energy-efficient technology, contributing to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. The partnership between Mopeka and Victron Energy introduces a new solution for monitoring water and propane usage, representing a business innovation by combining and improving existing products.
green_product: TRUE. The Mopeka Pro Check sensors and accessories are designed to significantly reduce environmental impact by enabling efficient monitoring of water and propane usage while promoting energy conservation and sustainable practices.
green_process: TRUE. The use of BLE technology in the Mopeka Pro Check sensors and their integration with Venus OS v 2.90 exemplify green processes by minimizing energy consumption and promoting sustainability in monitoring systems.

title: NextEra Energy is once again recognized as No. 1 in its industry on Fortune's list of 'World's Most Admired Companies' - PR Newswire
summary: NextEra Energy ranked No. 1 in the electric and gas utilities industry and received the highest overall company scores across all industries in Florida. The company has been named to Fortune's 2023 list of the 'World's Most Admired Companies' and has been recognized for its success in delivering low-cost clean energy solutions and investing in American infrastructure.

title: Masdar Makes Strategic Investment in One of the World's Largest Geothermal Players, Growing Clean Energy Portfolio ... - PR Newswire
summary: Masdar, a global clean energy powerhouse, is making a strategic investment in Pertamina Geothermal Energy (PGE) to enter the geothermal energy sector and expand its presence in the Asia-Pacific region.
green_innovation: TRUE, Masdar's investment in geothermal energy contributes to environmental sustainability goals by promoting the use of a stable, clean renewable resource that helps balance the intermittency of wind and solar energy.

green_product: FALSE, the article does not specifically mention a product, but rather focuses on Masdar's investment in geothermal energy plants.

title: KOHLER HERITAGE COLORS REVEALS ITS TWO TOP SHADES AT KBIS 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. announced the results of the Kohler Heritage Colors voting campaign, revealing two new shades for limited edition products. These colors are part of Kohler's 150th Anniversary celebration and pay homage to the company's colorful past innovations.
